userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There Are No Restrictions In The Collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification Of Item], Box [Insert Number], Folder [Insert Number And Title], The Papers Of Paul T. Schweitzer, Special Collections And University Archives, Patricia W. And J. Douglas Perry Library, Old Dominion University Libraries, Norfolk, Va 23529.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Collection Was Given To The Archives In 2020.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Bob Barker Was Host Of The Price Is Right For Almost 40 Years. It Was The Number One Daytime Game Show For A Number Of Years And Won Numerous Emmy Awards.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This Collection Contains The Correspondence Of Bob Barker Related To His Time On The Television Show, The Price Is Right.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Collection Is Arranged Into One Series: Series I: Correspondence.

did.unittitle: Bob Barker to Price is Right
